examples.sentence: Der Atheismus ist die Ablehnung des Glaubens an die Existenz Gottes oder von Göttern.
examples.translation: Atheism is the rejection of belief in the existence of God or gods.

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek ἄθεος (átheos, “godless”), from ἀ- (a-, “without”) + θεός (theós, “god”).

usage_notes.explanation: Atheismus refers to the philosophical position of disbelief in the existence of deities.
